amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $320 million appropriated for FEMA disaster to the annual contributions for assisted housing account, and exempt elderly and disabled recipients from rent increases.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 26, as amendment No. 47, to strike $320 million for FEMA disaster relief and appropriates the same amount to the Department of HUD Housing Programs; and exempts elderly and disabled families from rent increases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 248 (Roll no. 589).
